sources.title: 1930 - Reaching for the Moon - Comedy directed by Edmund Goulding
sources.description:
Coached by his valet (Edward Everett Horton), a Wall Street man (Douglas Fairbanks) chases a daring socialite (Bebe Daniels) to an ocean liner, where a mysterious cocktail stirs up chaos.  When the stock market crashes mid-voyage, Larry must win Vivian's heart without his fortune!

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/35dh8AfNcx4

Director: Edmund Goulding
Writers: Irving Berlin, Edmund Goulding, Elsie Janis
Starring: Douglas Fairbanks, Bebe Daniels, Edward Everett Horton, Claud Allister, Bing Crosby (in his film debut!), Jack Mulhall, June MacCloy

Genres: Comedy, Romance, Pre-code
Release date: February 21, 1931
Filming location: Hollywood

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Grappling with writer's block, legendary American poet Elizabeth Bishop travels from New York City to Rio de Janeiro in the 1950s to visit her college friend, Mary. Hoping to find inspiration on her sprawling estate, but she winds up with much more - a tempestuous relationship with her bohemian partner, architect Lota de Macedo Soares, that rocks the staid writer to her foundation. Alcoholism, geographical distance and a military coup come between the lovers, but their intimate connection spans decades and forever impacts the life and work of these two extraordinary artists.
metadata.Writer: Matthew Chapman, Julie Sayres, Carmen L. Oliveira
metadata.Actors: Gl√≥ria Pires, Miranda Otto, Tracy Middendorf
